    • checkSHHPermission

      public static boolean checkSHHPermission​(User user)
      Checks if a user has permission to modify SHH. The user must be an adult and part of the family (father, mother).
      Parameters:
      user - The user whom the permissions of modifying SHH are tested against.
      Returns:
      true if the user is allowed to modify SHH. false if the user is not allowed.

    • checkChangeTempPermission

      public static boolean checkChangeTempPermission​(User user, int x, int y)
      Checks if a user has permission to modify room temperature. The user must be an adult and part of the family (father, mother), or a guest within the same room that is wanted to modify.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whom the permissions of modifying the room temperature are tested against.
      x - The x position of the room is tested to modify.
      y - The y position of the room is tested to modify.
      Returns:
      true if the user is allowed to modify room temperature. false if the user is not allowed.

    • saveNewPermission

      public static void saveNewPermission​(boolean[] window, boolean[] door, boolean[] light, boolean[] away)
      Set the new permissions to the static variables and save to file
      Parameters:
      window - permissions
      door - permissions
      light - permissions

      public static java.lang.String readFromPermissionFile()
